name: Cost of milk formulae for Cow's Milk Protein Allergy (CMPA) per listed patients aged 0-4
title: Prescribing for Cow's Milk Protein Allergy (CMPA) per listed patients aged 0-4
why_it_matters: Prescribing for Cow's Milk Protein Allergy is increasing. Milk formulas are expensive, and should be reviewed
regularly to ensure that they are still required, particularly when Amino Acid Formula (AAF) products are used.
description: Cost of milk formulas for Cow's Milk Protein Allergy (CMPA) per listed patients aged 0-4
numerator_from: {hscic}.normalised_prescribing_standard p LEFT JOIN {measures}.cmpa_products r ON p.bnf_code=r.bnf_code
numerator_where: r.type != 'exclude' --this filters to all products not listed as 'excluded' in the products table'
